sentences.en: Come as intellectual economy, company finance affairs shows more and more apparent inelasticity, financial innovation is imperative.
sentences.cn: 随着知识经济到来，公司财务显示出越来越明显的不适应性，财务创新势在必行。

sentences.en: For inelasticity in rock endochronic theory was introduced into the study on the characteristic of rock.
sentences.cn: 针对岩石的非弹性特性,将内时理论引入到岩石特性的研究中来.

words.tran_cn: 无弹性的；无适应性的；不能适应的
不适应性；坚硬性；无弹力
